flawed_nl_solution:
Each episode is 20 minutes long, and there are 90 episodes, so the series takes 20 minutes per episode * 90 episodes = <<20*90=1080>>1080 minutes to watch.
1080 minutes / 60 minutes per hour = <<1080/60=18>>18 hours to watch the series.
Tom can watch 2 hours of TV a day, so it will take him 18 hours / 2 hours per day = <<18/2=9>>9 days to watch the entire series.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 1080. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
